subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
To strengthen the capacity of the DFY in collaboration with Stakeholders in managing the formulation and implementation of the Samoa National Youth Policy through the TALAVOU Programme and;
The development of the National Youth Data Base to track actual transformational changes directly resulting from the TALAVOU project.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Stregnthened capacity of DFY
